headline.main: U.S. Health Care Costs More Than 'Socialized' European Medicine

docs.abstract: As the U.S. Supreme Court prepared to hand down its judgment on President Obama's health care reforms, new figures show the U.S. spends far more on publicly funded health care than almost every other country in the developed world.
docs.snippet: As the U.S. Supreme Court prepared to hand down its judgment on President Obama's health care reforms, new figures show the U.S. spends far more on publicly funded health care than almost every other country in the developed world.

docs.lead_paragraph: The more controversial of two papers describing how the lethal H5N1 bird flu could be made easier to spread was published Thursday.

headline.seo: H5N1 Bird Flu Research That Stoked Fears Is Published
headline.main: Bird Flu Paper Is Published After Debate
headline.print_headline: Bird Flu Paper Is Published After Debate

docs.abstract: More controversial of two papers describing how the lethal H5N1 bird flu could be made easier to spread is published in the journal Science, six months after a scientific advisory board suggested that the papers’ most potentially dangerous data be censored.
docs.snippet: The more controversial of two papers describing how the lethal H5N1 bird flu could be made easier to spread was published Thursday.
